tagline: Know your user before you build for them
description: Your target developer wants an AI assistant that works everywhere— Telegram, Discord, Slack— without vendor lock-in. The empathy map reveals they crave flexibility over shiny features, and security over speed.

Ouroboros differentiates through chat platform unification AND a learning flywheel that remembers insights across sessions. The ECA delegation means you focus on unique value while leveraging battle-tested AI tooling.

tagline: Ship the minimum, learn the maximum
description: Your MVP is working: 58 passing tests, 268 assertions, ECA streaming to chat platforms, and a functional Web UX flywheel. The next iteration should validate real user adoption— get it into developers' hands via Docker.

tagline: Map the model, find the gaps
description: Problem: Fragmented AI tooling. Solution: Unified chat platform interface. Key Partners: ECA for AI, users for feedback. Channels: GitHub, Docker Hub. Revenue Stream: Open source with potential enterprise tiers for container isolation.
